projects.description: This project is an employee directory for a fictional company. It uses Fetch API to request data from the Random User Generator API. The JSON object from the API is parsed and a card is created for each employee with basic contact information. Clicking on an employee’s card will display a modal window with additional information. Within the modal window, employees can be toggled through continuously without having to exit the modal. The list of employees can be filtered using the search field.

This project is a browser-based phrase guessing game, created using JavaScript and Object-Oriented Programming. After clicking the Start Game button, the game board is revealed with a randomly selected phrase. The user guesses a letter by either clicking on the onscreen keyboard or by pressing the selected letter on their own keyboard, disabling that letter for future guesses. If the selected letter matches a letter in the phrase, the matching letter(s) in the phrase are revealed. If the selected letter does not match a letter in the phrase, one of the user’s 5 lives is removed. The player keeps guessing either until they guess all the letters and win, or they use up all 5 of their lives and lose the game.

What's next, Michael? Are you going to make dancing illegal? Is this the tiny town from Footloose? Get rid of the Seaward. Lucille: I'll leave when I'm good and ready. Someone order 140 pounds of upper body strength? Michael was having brunch with Sally Sitwell at a restaurant called Skip Church's Bistro. In addition to brunch, the restaurant was known for an item on the menu called the 'Skip's Scramble', an omelet that contained everything on the menu. Do not order the Skip's Scramble. I'd rather be dead in California than alive in Arizona.

Yes, Annyong. Your name is Annyong! We all know you're Annyong! Well, they got the Asian right… 'hotties' might be a stretch. I will pack your sweet pink mouth with so much ice cream you'll be the envy of every Jerry and Jane on the block! So you take your mom to work every day? Bummer. Moms are such a pain in the ass, huh? It's, like, die already! I was hoping he would be gifted sexually. It's, like, Hey, you want to go down to the whirlpool? Yeah, I don't have a husband. I call it Swing City. I've got a nice hard cot with his name on it. You'd do that to your own brother? I said 'cot.

A Colombian cartel that WON'T kidnap and kill you. Hey, look at that – you're mean sober, too. A million ****ing diamonds! Chicken fingers… with spicy club sauce. What do you think about Sudden Valley? It sounds like a salad dressing, but for some reason I don't want to eat it. It's a jetpack, Michael. What could possibly go wrong? You are a worse psychiatrist than you are a son-in-law and you will never get work as an actor because you have no talent. Heyyyy uncle father Oscar.
